actions.name: Imperious Mind
actions.description: Effect:If a space within range possesses Psychic Terrain, the user is affected by Psychic Terrain.

actions.name: Imperious Mind
actions.description: Effect:While Psychic Terrain is active, the user's SPATK stat is increased by 50%. In Psychic Terrain, the user loses a Tick of HP at the end of each of their activations.

system.description: Effect:While Psychic Terrain is active, the user's SPATK stat is increased by 50%. In Psychic Terrain, the user loses a Tick of HP at the end of each of their activations. If a space within range possesses Psychic Terrain, the user is affected by Psychic Terrain.
